messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: mom's "doting"
messages.msgSnippet: *****Sorcha wrote: If the things you think you re doing for another person are things which, if rejected by the person you re doing them for, would lead you to
messages.messageBody:
*****Sorcha wrote: If the things you think you're doing for another person are things which, if rejected by the person you're doing them for, would lead you to feel angry or to call the person ungrateful, then you're really doing them to feel good about yourself.

Well said. Could you re-post this exact statement about November 21, when I start to go into my holiday meltdown madness? :-P

Kay

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
